articles.description: Pakistan play Canada at the Men's T20 World Cup in New York - follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: Pakistan vs Canada LIVE: ICC T20 World Cup 2024 - cricket score, commentary, video highlights & updates

articles.description: England manager Gareth Southgate says Euro 2024 could be his "last chance" to win a trophy with England.
articles.title: England: Gareth Southgate says Euro 2024 could be last chance to win with national team

articles.description: France boss Didier Deschamps won the World Cup as a player and manager and now he is aiming to achieve the same feat in the European Championship.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Didier Deschamps bids to make more history with France

articles.description: Germany midfielder Toni Kroos says his Real Madrid teammate Jude Bellingham is "the complete package" and can handle the weight of English expectation at Euro 2024.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham: Toni Kroos says Real Madrid teammate can handle England pressure

articles.description: Captain Jos Buttler says England must not get "consumed" by the permutations as they attempt to keep their T20 World Cup campaign alive.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: England will not get consumed by permutations, says Jos Buttler

articles.description: Andy Murray's first match of the grass-court season ends in defeat by American Marcos Giron at the Stuttgart Open.
articles.title: Stuttgart Open: Andy Murray beaten in first round

articles.description: Defending champion Keely Hodgkinson wins the fastest-ever European Athletics Championships women's 800m semi-final.
articles.title: European Athletics Championships 2024: Keely Hodgkinson eases into 800m final

articles.description: BBC Sport heads to the New York Mets' Citi Life baseball stadium for a special India v Pakistan fan zone.
articles.title: T20 World Cup Video: India and Pakistan fans at New York Mets fan zone - BBC Sport

articles.description: Emma Raducanu defies a late wobble to get her grass-court season off to a winning start with a straight sets victory over Japan's Ena Shibahara.
articles.title: Nottingham Open: Emma Raducanu overcomes late wobble to beat Ena Shibahara in straight sets

articles.description: Golfers need to be better at checking on each other's well-being given "80% of players storm off" unhappy with their rounds, says Wyndham Clark, who will defend his US Open title at Pinehurst this week.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Mental health key as '80% of players storm off', says champion Wyndham Clark
